00056 /**

00058  * Synopsis: Calls the PGOptions usage method.
00059  *

00061  * return - exits program.
00062  *
00063  */
00064 /*****************************************************************************/
00065 void displayHelpAndExit(PgOptions * opts)
00066 {
00067 
00068   assert(opts);
00069 
00070   opts->usage();
00071 
00072   cout << endl << endl;
00073 
00074   exit(0);
00075 
00076 }

00078 /*****************************************************************************/
00079 /**
00080  * getOptions:
00081  * Synopsis: Fill the PGOptions data structure with our options. Note that
00082  * this program is intended to run with no options via "make regression".
00083  * If there are options they should be passed in via the Makefile.
00084  *
00085  * @param name1 - description
00086  * @param name1 - description
00087  * @return - description
00088  */
00089 /*****************************************************************************/
00090 void getOptions(int argc, char * argv[],   RunTimeEnvironment & rte,
00091                 const FsTestDir & testDir)
00092 {
00093 
00094   assert(argv);
00095 
00096   PgOptions  * pgOpts        = new PgOptions();
00097 
00098   pgOpts->defineOption("i", "input-dir", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00099                        "Input regression data directory", "");
00100 
00101   // Parse options and store into the opts data structure.
00102   pgOpts->parseArgv(argv);
00103 
00104   rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName        = pgOpts->getProgName();
00105   
00106   int i                      = rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName.rfind("/") ;
00107   rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName        = rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName.substr(i > 0 ? i + 1 : 0);
00108 
00109   rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir
00110   = pgOpts->get("input-dir").empty() ? INPUT_DIR : pgOpts->get("input-dir");
00111 
00112   rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir       = testDir.asString();
00113 
00114   rte.m_adtOpts.m_verbosity       = ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION;
00115 
00116   Verbose::setLevel(rte.m_adtOpts.m_verbosity);
00117 
00118   return;
00119 
00120 }
00121 // end getOptions

00123 /*****************************************************************************/
00124 /**
00125  * getDMET2AlgorithmChecks:
00126  * Synopsis: Get the DME2 Genotype files and their corresponding DMET2 files
00127  *           for regression comparision
00128  *
00129  *
00130  *
00131  *
00132  * @param rte - the run time environment
00133  * @param cmd -  for return
00134  * @return - The vector of RegressionCheck objects as well as a command to run them.
00135  */
00136 /*****************************************************************************/
00137 map< string, vector< RegressionCheck *> > getDMET2AlgorithmChecks(RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00138 {
00139 
00140   map< string, vector< RegressionCheck *> > checks;
00141 
00142   list <string> searchFilesList
00143   = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::
00144     FileUtils::ListFiles(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str(), "txt");
00145 
00146   list<string>::iterator itS;
00147 
00148   pcrecpp::RE dmet2RE("DMET2_Genotypes_Short");
00149 
00150   for (itS = searchFilesList.begin(); itS != searchFilesList.end(); itS++) {
00151 
00152     string genoFile = *itS;
00153 
00154     if (dmet2RE.PartialMatch(genoFile)) {
00155 
00156       // Replace the input directory with the output directory.
00157       string genoFileRoot = Fs::basename(genoFile);
00158 
00159       Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_TMI, genoFile);
00160 
00161       string dmet2MarkerFile = genoFile + "." + DMET2_REGRESSION_MARKER_FILE_EXT;
00162       string dmet3MarkerFile = Fs::join(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir,
00163                                         genoFileRoot+"."+RegressionExperimentReport::getDmet3MarkerFileNameExt());
00164 
00165       string dmet2HaplotypeFile = genoFile + "." + DMET2_REGRESSION_HAPLOTYPE_FILE_EXT;
00166       string dmet3HaplotypeFile = Fs::join(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir,
00167                                            genoFileRoot+"."+RegressionExperimentReport::getDmet3HaplotypeFileNameExt());
00168 
00169       if (! Fs::isReadable(dmet2MarkerFile)) {
00170         APT_ERR_ABORT(genoFile + ": missing DMET2 marker regression file.");
00171       }
00172       if (! Fs::isReadable(dmet2HaplotypeFile)) {
00173         APT_ERR_ABORT(genoFile + ": missing DMET2 haplotype regression file.");
00174       }
00175       // HACK: in reality the Marker and Haplotype files are created
00176       // in the same call. The RegressionTest object doesn't support this,
00177       // so we'll invoke the program twice and pretend the invocations were
00178       // different.
00179       
00180       string cmd;
00181       cmd = Fs::join(".","apt-dmet-translation");
00182       cmd = cmd + " -v 2 ";
00183       cmd = cmd + " --marker-report --dmet2-calling -r 1 -o " + rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir  + " -i " ;
00184       cmd = cmd + rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str() + " -g " + genoFile;
00185 
00186       checks[cmd].push_back(new DMET2MarkerCheck(rte, dmet2MarkerFile, dmet3MarkerFile, genoFile));
00187       checks[cmd].push_back(new DMET2HaplotypeCheck(rte, dmet2HaplotypeFile, dmet3HaplotypeFile , genoFile));
00188 
00189     }
00190 
00191   }
00192 
00193   return checks;
00194 }
00195 
00196 // end getDMET2AlgorithmChecks
00197 /*****************************************************************************/
00198 /*****************************************************************************/
00199 /**
00200  * runDmet2AlgorithmRegression:
00201  * Synopsis: Run algorithem regression 
00202  *
00203  *
00204  * @param name1 - description
00205  * @param name1 - description
00206  * @return - description
00207  */
00208 /*****************************************************************************/
00209 bool runDmet2AlgorithmRegression(RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00210 {
00211 
00212   bool allPass = true;
00213   string cmd;
00214 
00215   map< string, vector< RegressionCheck *> > checks = getDMET2AlgorithmChecks(rte);
00216   map< string, vector< RegressionCheck *> >::iterator itSVRC;
00217 
00218   Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Running DMET2 tests...");
00219 
00220   int i = 0;
00221   for (itSVRC = checks.begin(); itSVRC != checks.end(); itSVRC++) {
00222     i++;
00223 
00224     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, itSVRC->first);
00225     std::string name = "DMET2-" + ToStr(i);
00226     RegressionTest dmet2Test(name.c_str(), itSVRC->first.c_str(), itSVRC->second);
00227 
00228     int pass = dmet2Test.pass();
00229 
00230     if (!pass) {
00231       Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, dmet2Test.getErrorMsg(), false);
00232     }
00233 
00234     allPass = allPass && pass;
00235 
00236   }
00237 
00238   if (!allPass) {
00239     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Failed DMET2 algorithm tests!");
00240   } else {
00241     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Passed DMET2 algorithm tests!");
00242   }
00243 
00244   return allPass;
00245 
00246 }
00247 // end runDmet2AlgorithmRegression

00250 /**
00251  * getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath:
00252  * Synopsis:
00253  * Helper function for getDMET3ReportChecks.
00254  *
00255  * The file path can either be
00256  * 1.) absolute or relative to the current path (AS IS).
00257  *
00258  * 2.) In the corresponding test case directory. Take the test case
00259  * file, strip the extension and look in the corresponding directory.
00260  * If the file exists in this test case directory then return the path
00261  * relative to the regression directory. 
00262  * 
00263  * *
00264  * @param tesCase - the test case CSV file
00265  * @param pathToCheck - the file from the test case CSV to get the path for.
00266  * @param pathToUse   - the return path
00267  * 
00268  * @return - true of the file exists, false otherwise, pathToUse is filled in.
00269  */
00270 /*****************************************************************************/
00271 static bool getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath( string testCase, const string & pathToCheck, string & pathToUse, bool returnInvalidPathToUse = false) {
00272 
00273 
00274   if ( Fs::isReadable(pathToCheck) ) {
00275     pathToUse = pathToCheck;
00276     return true;
00277   }
00278   
00279   string testCaseDir = testCase.substr(0,testCase.rfind("."));
00280 
00281   if ( Fs::isReadable(Fs::join(TEST_DATA_REGRESSION_DIR,pathToCheck))) {
00282     pathToUse = Fs::join(TEST_DATA_REGRESSION_DIR,pathToCheck);
00283     return true;
00284   }
00285 
00286   if ( Fs::isReadable(Fs::join(testCaseDir,pathToCheck))) {
00287     pathToUse = Fs::join(testCaseDir,pathToCheck);
00288     return true;
00289   }
00290 
00291   if ( returnInvalidPathToUse ) {
00292     pathToUse = Fs::join(TEST_DATA_REGRESSION_DIR  + testCaseDir,pathToCheck);
00293   }
00294     
00295   return false;
00296 
00297 }
00298 // end getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath
00299 /*****************************************************************************/
00300 /*****************************************************************************/
00301 /**
00302  * getDMET3ReportChecksInitializeFiles
00303  * Synopsis:
00304  * Helper function for getDMET3ReportChecks.
00305  *
00306  * Initialize the files from the CSV file by possible adding
00307  * the test case directory. Make sure all files exist or abort. 
00308  *
00309  * 
00310  * *
00311  * @param testCase - the test case CSV file
00312  * @param pathToCheck - the file from the test case CSV to get the path for.
00313  * @param pathToUse   - the return path
00314  * 
00315  * @return - true of the file exists, false otherwise, pathToUse is filled in.
00316  */
00317 /*****************************************************************************/
00318 static void getDMET3ReportChecksInitializeFiles( string testCase, const vector< string > testCaseRow, DMET3ReportTestCheckFiles & returnFiles ) {
00319 
00320   
00321   if ( ! getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath(testCase, testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::CHP_FILES], returnFiles.m_chpFiles) ) {
00322     APT_ERR_ABORT(testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::CHP_FILES] +  string(" file not found.") );
00323   }
00324   if ( ! getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath(testCase, testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::TRANSLATION_FILE], returnFiles.m_translationFile) ) {
00325     APT_ERR_ABORT(testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::TRANSLATION_FILE] +  string(" file not found.") );
00326   }
00327   if ( ! getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath(testCase, testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::ANNOTATION_FILE], returnFiles.m_annotationFile) ) {
00328     APT_ERR_ABORT(testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::ANNOTATION_FILE] +  string(" file not found.") );
00329   }
00330   if ( !testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::MARKER_FILE].empty() &&
00331        ! getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath(testCase, testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::MARKER_FILE], returnFiles.m_markerFile)) {
00332     APT_ERR_ABORT(testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::MARKER_FILE] +  string(" file not found.") );
00333   }
00334   if ( !testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::OVERRIDE_FILE].empty() &&
00335        !getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath(testCase, testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::OVERRIDE_FILE], returnFiles.m_overrideFile)) {
00336     APT_ERR_ABORT(testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::OVERRIDE_FILE] +  string(" file not found.") );
00337   }
00338 
00339   vector< std::string > reports;
00340   reports.push_back("comprehensive");
00341   reports.push_back("uncalled");
00342   reports.push_back("summary");
00343 
00344   for ( int i =0; i < reports.size(); i++ ) {
00345     
00346     // BUILD EXPECTED RESULT FILES
00347     if ( pcrecpp::RE(reports[i]).PartialMatch(testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::EXPECTED_RESULT_REPORTS]) ) {
00348       string test = testCaseRow[DMET3TestCaseTableModel::BASE_NAME] +  string("_expected_results_") + reports[i] + string(".rpt");
00349       string result;
00350       if ( ! getDMET3ReportChecksFilePath( testCase, test, result, true ) ) {
00351         APT_ERR_ABORT( result + string(" file not found.") );
00352       }
00353       returnFiles.m_resultFiles[reports[i]] = result;
00354     }
00355   }
00356   
00357 }
00358 // end getDMET3ReportChecksInitializeFiles
00359 /*****************************************************************************/
00360 /**
00361  * getDMET3ReportChecks:
00362  * Synopsis: Get the DMET3 test case CSV files. 
00363  *
00364  *
00365  *
00366  * @param rte - the run time environment
00367  * 
00368  * @return - The vector of RegressionCheck objects 
00369  */
00370 /*****************************************************************************/
00371 map< string, vector< RegressionCheck *> > getDMET3ReportChecks(RunTimeEnvironment & rte) {
00372   string cmd;
00373   
00374   map<  string, vector< RegressionCheck *> >checks;
00375   
00376   string comprehensive_dir = Fs::join(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir,"DMET3");
00377 
00378   /// @todo add this to Fs.
00379   list <string> searchFilesList
00380   = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::
00381     FileUtils::ListFiles(comprehensive_dir.c_str(), "csv");
00382 
00383   list<string>::iterator sflIt1 = searchFilesList.begin();
00384   
00385   for (; sflIt1 != searchFilesList.end(); ++sflIt1) {
00386     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL,string("DMET3 Test Case File: ") + *sflIt1);
00387 
00388     DMET3TestCaseTableModel testCases(rte, *sflIt1 );
00389 
00390     for (int i =0; i < testCases.size(); i++ ) {
00391 
00392       DMET3ReportTestCheckFiles tcf;
00393       
00394       getDMET3ReportChecksInitializeFiles( *sflIt1, testCases.m_rows[i], tcf);
00395       
00396       cmd = Fs::join(".",TRANSLATION_PROGRAM);
00397       //cmd = cmd + string(" -v -1 ");
00398       if ( pcrecpp::RE("[xX][mM][lL]$").PartialMatch(tcf.m_chpFiles) ) {
00399         cmd = cmd + string(" --xml-file ") + tcf.m_chpFiles;
00400       }
00401       else {
00402         cmd = cmd + string(" -b ") + testCases.m_rows[i][DMET3TestCaseTableModel::BASE_NAME];
00403         cmd = cmd + string(" -o ") + rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir + string(" ") ;
00404         cmd = cmd + string(" -a ") + tcf.m_annotationFile;
00405         cmd = cmd + string(" -t ") + tcf.m_translationFile;
00406         if ( pcrecpp::RE("[tT][Xx][tT]$").PartialMatch(tcf.m_chpFiles) ) {
00407           cmd = cmd + string(" -E ") + tcf.m_chpFiles;
00408         }
00409         else {
00410           cmd = cmd + string(" -e ") + tcf.m_chpFiles;
00411         }
00412         if ( !tcf.m_markerFile.empty() ) {
00413           cmd = cmd + string(" -m ") + tcf.m_markerFile;
00414         }
00415         if ( !tcf.m_overrideFile.empty() ) {
00416           cmd = cmd + string(" -n ") + tcf.m_overrideFile;
00417         }
00418       }
00419       
00420       cerr << "CMD: " << endl;
00421       checks[cmd].push_back(new DMET3TestCaseCheck(rte, *sflIt1, testCases.m_rows[i], tcf ));
00422     }
00423   }
00424 
00425 
00426   return checks;
00427   
00428 }
00429 // end getDMET3ReportChecks
00430 /*****************************************************************************/
00431 /*****************************************************************************/
00432 /**
00433  * runDmet3ReportRegression:
00434  * Synopsis: 
00435  * 
00436  * 
00437  * 
00438  *
00439  * @param rte - the run time envrionment 
00440  * 
00441  * @return - true if all tests passed, false otherwise. 
00442  */
00443 /*****************************************************************************/
00444 bool runDmet3ReportRegression(RunTimeEnvironment & rte) {
00445 
00446   bool allPass = true;
00447   string cmd;
00448 
00449   map< string, vector< RegressionCheck *> > checks = getDMET3ReportChecks(rte);
00450   map< string, vector< RegressionCheck *> >::iterator itSVRC;
00451 
00452   Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, string("Running DMET3 Report Test Cases (")  + ToStr(checks.size()) + string(")..."));
00453 
00454   int i=0;
00455   for (itSVRC = checks.begin(); itSVRC != checks.end(); itSVRC++) {
00456     i++;
00457 
00458     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, itSVRC->first);
00459 
00460     std::string name = "DMET2-" + ToStr(i);
00461     RegressionTest dmet3TestCase(name.c_str(), itSVRC->first.c_str(), itSVRC->second);
00462 
00463     int pass = dmet3TestCase.pass();
00464 
00465     allPass = allPass && pass;
00466 
00467   }
00468 
00469   if (!allPass) {
00470     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Failed DMET3 report tests!");
00471   } else {
00472     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Passed DMET3 report tests!");
00473   }
00474 
00475   return allPass;
00476   
00477 
00478   return true;
00479   
00480 }
00481 // end runDmet3ReportRegression
00482 /*****************************************************************************/
00483 /*****************************************************************************/
00484 /**
00485  * main
00486  * Synopsis: main control loop.
00487  *
00488  * @param argc - command line
00489  * @param argv - command line
00490  * @return - 0 ok, 1 on error
00491  */
00492 /*****************************************************************************/
00493 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00494 {
00495   try {
00496 
00497     bool okToContinue = true;
00498 
00499     string timeStamp(Util::getTimeStamp());
00500 
00501     FsTestDir testDir;
00502     testDir.setTestDir("translation", true);
00503 
00504     RunTimeEnvironment  *rte = new RunTimeEnvironment();
00505 
00506     getOptions(argc, argv, *rte, testDir);
00507     
00508     rte->initializeRunTimeEnvironment();
00509     
00510     Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00511     
00512     string verboseLogName = Fs::join(rte->m_adtOpts.m_outputDir,"dmet-translation-test.log");
00513     
00514     std::ofstream *verboseOFStream = new std::ofstream;
00515     
00516     if (!Fs::isWriteableDir(rte->m_adtOpts.m_outputDir)) {
00517       if (Fs::mkdirPath(rte->m_adtOpts.m_outputDir, false) != APT_OK) {
00518         APT_ERR_ABORT("Can't make or write to directory: " + rte->m_adtOpts.m_outputDir);
00519       }
00520     }
00521     
00522     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(*(verboseOFStream), verboseLogName.c_str());
00523     
00524     ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM logVerbosity = ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION;
00525     if (rte->m_adtOpts.m_verbosity > ADT_VERBOSE_EXCEPTION) {
00526         logVerbosity = (ADT_VERBOSE_ENUM) rte->m_adtOpts.m_verbosity;
00527     }
00528     
00529     LogStream *verboseLogStream = new
00530     LogStream(logVerbosity,  verboseOFStream);
00531     
00532     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(verboseLogStream);
00533     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(verboseLogStream);
00534     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(verboseLogStream);
00535     Verbose::setLevel(rte->m_adtOpts.m_verbosity);
00536     
00537     timeStamp = Util::getTimeStamp();
00538     
00539     rte->m_programTime.begin();
00540     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "[" + rte->m_programName  + " " + timeStamp + "]  BEGIN ");
00541     
00542     
00543     okToContinue = runDmet2AlgorithmRegression(*rte) && okToContinue;
00544     okToContinue = runDmet3ReportRegression(*rte) && okToContinue;
00545     
00546     
00547     timeStamp = Util::getTimeStamp();
00548     
00549     if (!okToContinue) {
00550         Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Failed regression tests!");
00551     } else {
00552         Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Passed ALL regression tests!");
00553     }
00554     
00555     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "[" + rte->m_programName  + " " + timeStamp + "]  END ");
00556     
00557     delete rte;
00558     rte = NULL;
00559     
00560     if (!okToContinue) {
00561         exit(1);
00562     }
00563     
00564     exit(0);
00565     
00566   }
00567   catch(...) {
00568       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00569       return 1;
00570   }
00571   return 1;
00572 }
00573 // end main
